data.name: Sample - Jira - 1.1.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Jira" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Add Attachment
workflows.description: Submits a file that is present in FortiSOAR for analysis to Jira based on the FortiSOAR file IRI input parameters you have specified

params.ticket_description: Creation of an issue using project keys and issue type names using the REST API

resource.jiraStatus: {% if vars.steps.Create_Ticket.data.status in statusmapping %}status_mapping[vars.steps.Create_Ticket.data.status]{% else %}None{% endif %}
resource.description: Creation of an issue using project keys and issue type names using the REST API

workflows.name: List Tickets
workflows.description: Lists all tickets in a project

params.comment: Updating comment automatically from CS record

workflows.name: Get Comments
workflows.description: Retrieves list of comments to an existing Jira ticket on your configured Jira server.

workflows.name: Update FortiSOAR Record
workflows.description: Webhook playbook to get updates from Jira

arguments.jira_mapping_status: { 	"Open": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Back_to_open', '@id')}}", 	"Work in progress": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Start_progress', '@id')}}", 	"Pending": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Pending', '@id')}}", 	"Done": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Mark_as_Done', '@id')}}", 	"Reopened": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Reopen_issue', '@id')}}", 	"Waiting for customer": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Respond_to_customer', '@id')}}", 	"Resolved": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Resolve_this_issue', '@id')}}", 	"Escalated": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Escalate_this_issue', '@id')}}", 	"Canceled": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Cancel_request', '@id')}}", 	"3": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('In_progress', '@id')}}", 	"10005": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Escalate', '@id')}}", 	"In Progress": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Back_to_in_progress', '@id')}}", 	"Closed": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Close', '@id')}}", 	"Waiting for support": "{{'JiraStatus'| picklist('Respond_to_support', '@id')}}" }

workflows.name: Add Comment
workflows.description: Adds a new Comment To Jira Ticket

params.comment: This is a comment regarding the quality of the response.

workflows.name: Add Remote Link
workflows.description: Creates an issue remote link to an existing specified issue
